titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on MUB 738 INT.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/10/1999--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2003, the duty on 2-amino-4(4- aminobenzoylamino) benzene sulphonic acid (MUB 738 INT).
